sn42.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava mallesu viharati uruvelakappam nama mallanam nigamo.
sn42.11:1.2: Atha kho bhadrako gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho bhadrako gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.11:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava dukkhassa samudayanca atthangamanca desetu”ti.
sn42.11:1.4: “Ahance te, gamani, atitamaddhanam arabbha dukkhassa samudayanca atthangamanca deseyyam:
sn42.11:1.5: ‘evam ahosi atitamaddhanan’ti, tatra te siya kankha, siya vimati.
sn42.11:1.6: Ahance te, gamani, anagatamaddhanam arabbha dukkhassa samudayanca atthangamanca deseyyam:
sn42.11:1.7: ‘evam bhavissati anagatamaddhanan’ti, tatrapi te siya kankha, siya vimati.
sn42.11:1.8: Api caham, gamani, idheva nisinno ettheva te nisinnassa dukkhassa samudayanca atthangamanca desessami.
sn42.11:1.9: Tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn42.11:1.10: “Evam, bhante”ti kho bhadrako gamani bhagavato paccassosi.
sn42.11:2.2: atthi te uruvelakappe manussa yesam te vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn42.11:2.3: “Atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussa yesam me vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti.
sn42.11:2.4: “Atthi pana te, gamani, uruvelakappe manussa yesam te vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va nuppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn42.11:2.5: “Atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussa yesam me vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va nuppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti.
sn42.11:2.6: “Ko nu kho, gamani, hetu, ko paccayo yena te ekaccanam uruvelakappiyanam manussanam vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn42.11:2.7: “Yesam me, bhante, uruvelakappiyanam manussanam vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa, atthi me tesu chandarago.
sn42.11:2.8: Yesam pana, bhante, uruvelakappiyanam manussanam vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va nuppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa, natthi me tesu chandarago”ti.
sn42.11:2.9: “Imina tvam, gamani, dhammena ditthena viditena akalikena pattena pariyogalhena atitanagate nayam nehi:
sn42.11:2.10: ‘yam kho kinci atitamaddhanam dukkham uppajjamanam uppajji sabbam tam chandamulakam chandanidanam.
sn42.11:2.12: Yampi hi kinci anagatamaddhanam dukkham uppajjamanam uppajjissati, sabbam tam chandamulakam chandanidanam.
sn42.11:2.16: ‘yam kinci dukkham uppajjamanam uppajjati, sabbam tam chandamulakam chandanidanam.
sn42.11:2.18: Atthi me, bhante, ciravasi nama kumaro bahi avasathe pativasati.
sn42.11:2.19: So khvaham, bhante, kalasseva vutthaya purisam uyyojemi:
sn42.11:2.21: Yavakivanca, bhante, so puriso nagacchati, tassa me hoteva annathattam:
sn42.11:3.2: ciravasissa kumarassa vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn42.11:3.3: “Ciravasissa me, bhante, kumarassa vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti.
sn42.11:3.5: ‘yam kinci dukkham uppajjamanam uppajjati, sabbam tam chandamulakam chandanidanam.
sn42.11:4.2: yada te ciravasimata adittha ahosi, assuta ahosi, te ciravasimatuya chando va rago va pemam va”ti?
sn42.11:4.4: “Dassanam va te, gamani, agamma savanam va evam te ahosi:
sn42.11:4.5: ‘ciravasimatuya chando va rago va pemam va’”ti?
sn42.11:5.2: ciravasimatuya te vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
sn42.11:5.3: “Ciravasimatuya me, bhante, vadhena va bandhena va janiya va garahaya va jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti.
sn42.11:5.5: ‘yam kinci dukkham uppajjamanam uppajjati, sabbam tam chandamulakam chandanidanam.
